subject: Eugene Deployment Map changes
body:
Good afternoon,
 
We want to shift the following four cameras to better align with what we are looking to capture.
 
Move Chambers and Lorane Hwy to Chambers and 28th, catching the same direction of travel.
Move Cal Young and Safeway to Cal Young just west of Willakenzie.
Move Willamette and 10th to Willamette and 11th, catching westbound traffic.
Move Green Acres Rd @ N Delta Hwy EB to Coburg Road at Crescent looking westbound down Crescent.
Move Hilyard Street @ E Amazon Drive EB to Fir Lane at River Road looking northbound
Move Chambers Street @ West 6th Avenue NB to Chambers Street SB prior to West 2nd Avenue
Move Hilyard Street @ Amazon Pkwy SB to West 6th Avenue at Madison Street catching WB West 6th.
 
Remove F041 Barger Drive @ W. Irwin Way EB.  I think that puts us at the allotted 57.
 
Let me know if there are any issues with these movements.

Derek
 
Detective D. DeWitt
Financial Crimes Unit
Special Weapons and Tactics Team
Background Investigations Team
Eugene Police Department
300 County Club Road
Eugene, OR 97401
Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.
Desk Phone � 541-682-2682
Work Cell � 541-743-6192
